query: select 1 from dual where exists (select 1 from information_schema.TABLES where information_schema.TABLES.TABLE_NAME = 'proc' and information_schema.TABLES.TABLE_SCHEMA = 'mysql')

v3-plan.Original: select 1 from dual where exists (select 1 from information_schema.TABLES where information_schema.TABLES.TABLE_NAME = 'proc' and information_schema.TABLES.TABLE_SCHEMA = 'mysql')

Instructions.Query: select 1 from dual where exists (select 1 from information_schema.`TABLES` where information_schema.`TABLES`.TABLE_NAME = :TABLES_TABLE_NAME and information_schema.`TABLES`.TABLE_SCHEMA = :__vtschemaname limit 1)
